alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:22AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Rooks and Phillips Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 221 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Norton to near Edmond to near Bogue. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Logan around 235 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Stockton, Long Island and Speed. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for north central Kansas.
